title: Elia Viviani Signs with Lotto, But These Top Pros Are Still Searching for a Team in 2025
content:
Viviani secures a deal, but nearly a dozen WorldTour pros are still holding out for a lifeline as the 2025 season is already underway.

Read the full article at Elia Viviani Signs with Lotto, But These Top Pros Are Still Searching for a Team in 2025 on Velo.
author: ahood
